allow: Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://attendance_system_866u_user:Ihb9jdoOTYzb4c0u7cXxGo8XaIb1Iyvt@dpg-d3i4mqjipnbc73dsnd6g-a.oregon-postgres.render.com/attendance_system_866u" node -e "const {sequelize} = require(''./backend/src/config/database''); sequelize.query(""SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND (table_name LIKE ''biometric_%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%consent%'') ORDER BY table_name"").then(([results]) => {console.log(''📊 Tablas biométricas en BD:''); results.forEach(r => console.log(''  ✅'', r.table_name)); process.exit(0);}).catch(err => {console.error(err); process.exit(1);})")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://attendance_system_866u_user:Ihb9jdoOTYzb4c0u7cXxGo8XaIb1Iyvt@dpg-d3i4mqjipnbc73dsnd6g-a.oregon-postgres.render.com/attendance_system_866u" node -e "const {sequelize} = require(''./backend/src/config/database''); sequelize.query(""SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''public'' AND (table_name LIKE ''biometric_%'' OR table_name LIKE ''%consent%'') ORDER BY table_name"").then(([results]) => {console.log(''📊 Tablas en producción:''); if(results.length === 0) {console.log(''  ❌ NO HAY TABLAS BIOMÉTRICAS'');} else {results.forEach(r => console.log(''  ✅'', r.table_name));} process.exit(0);}).catch(err => {console.error(''❌ Error:'', err.message); process.exit(1);})")
